title: Bringing Good Luck to your Husband in the ’70s - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cooking   Cute Children   Doting Love Interests   Family Conflict   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Military   Pregnancy   Protagonist Falls in Love First   System Administrator   Time Travel   Transmigration
author: Yue ban yao fen jia   月半要分家
description:
Su Yue’s lifelong hobby and career was to study food, but she did not expect to be selected by a Good Luck System after her accidental death.

Her task was to travel to the 1970s and marry an unlucky soldier so she could help him live his life smoothly. At least the rewards given by the system could be bought with food!

From then on, Su Yue started the life of bringing good luck to her husband in the 70’s with delicious food.>
